page.title: 09HALL FARM, HUNDALL.
page.content: There are 13 farms in this area. One is Hall Farm, Hundall. It is run by two bros.,{George & Fred Elliot. George & his wife live at the farm, Fred & his wife have a council house nearby. They bought the farm in 1971. They have a 120 acres & grow wheat, barley, oats, potatoes, turnips, & grass for pasture. They raise cattle, pigs & poultry. They have additional help from two labourers. Cattle is sold at Bakewell, turnips and potatoes in Sheffield, pigs at Doncaster, and milk goes to Express Dairies, Chesterfield. Machinery includes tractor & trailer, corn drills, mowing machinery, plough, disc harrow, potato lifter, corn-mill, silage cutter, potato sorter, corn- spray, 2 hay bailers, diesel driven mangold cutter. No plans for future.
